comments.content: Looks like T26 Interfacer, but not quite.

We just did one like this a couple of days ago. [Interfacer](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142254/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/interfacer/) from T-26 was mentioned, and this time I think it was the one used. Some of the 'maelstrom' letters were built with Interfacer characters.
